name: Subway
address: 7900 Westminster Hwy Unit 101, Richmond, BC V6X 1A5, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Steak & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Hot, tender, shaved steak, served on the bread of your choice. It's just bursting with flavour! Toast your bread to add even more great taste!

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Breast
hasMenuItem.description: Simple, yet always bursting with flavour. Dive into our deli-style turkey breast sandwich made with turkey raised on Canadian farms and topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant!

hasMenuItem.name: #6 Teriyaki Crunch
hasMenuItem.description: We added some crunch to this sweet & savoury favourite! The Teriyaki Crunch sandwich comes with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips, lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions, double the processed cheddar cheese, the satisfying crunch of our crispy onions and topped with our Sweet Onion Teriyaki sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna
hasMenuItem.description: You’ll love every bite of our classic tuna sandwich. 100% wild caught tuna blended with creamy mayonnaise then topped with your choice of crisp, fresh veggies. 100% delicious.

hasMenuItem.name: Meatball Marinara
hasMenuItem.description: Zesty meatballs covered with marinara sauce, and served on your choice of bread. Every bite is simply sensational! Get it toasted for even more great taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Delite®
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy, crunchy and classically delicious. The Veggie Delite® is proof that a veggie sandwich can be high in flavour. Try a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, cucumbers and onions. Customize it with your choice of condiments on the bread of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
hasMenuItem.description: Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki is stuffed with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips and fresh veggies, topped with our Sweet Onion Teriyaki sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Cold Cut Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love our Cold Cut Combo! One bite into these delicious deli meats, topped with crisp vegetables and served on your choice of bread and you'll be addicted.

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza Sub Melt
hasMenuItem.description: The Italian sandwich par excellence. Topped with marinara sauce, cheese and pepperoni. Try it toasted for even more pizza taste!

hasMenuItem.name: #2 Great Canadian Club
hasMenuItem.description: Love the taste of Canada? Join the Club! Enjoy our Great Canadian Club, with Deli-Style turkey and ham, Maplewood Smoked bacon, made from Canadian farm-raised turkey and pork, topped with twice the Canadian cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our Smoky Honey Mustard sauce for some added zest, eh?

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Patty
hasMenuItem.description: Our veggie patty is vegan and free of artificial colours and flavours. Topped with lettuce, spinach, onions, peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers and your favourite sauce!

hasMenuItem.name: 6-Pack Chocolate Chunk Cookies (1310 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, our cookies are always a great addition to a delicious meal. Tender and moist, it is the perfect shareable dessert to complement your meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Steak & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Hot, tender, shaved steak, served on the bread of your choice. It's just bursting with flavour! Toast your bread to add even more great taste! Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Breast
hasMenuItem.description: Simple, yet always bursting with flavour. Dive into our deli-style turkey breast sandwich made with turkey raised on Canadian farms and topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant! Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Cold Cut Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love our Cold Cut Combo! One bite into these delicious deli meats, topped with crisp vegetables and served on your choice of bread and you'll be addicted. Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: #5 Chicken Rancher
hasMenuItem.description: A fan favourite gets some added zing. The Chicken Rancher features Canadian farm-raised chicken and pork, made with rotisserie-style chicken and Maplewood Smoked Bacon, topped with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions, twice the shredded Monterrey Jack and cheddar, and the zesty kick of our Peppercorn Ranch dressing. Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: #2 Great Canadian Club
hasMenuItem.description: Love the taste of Canada? Join the Club! Enjoy our Great Canadian Club, with Deli-Style turkey and ham, Maplewood Smoked bacon, made from Canadian farm-raised turkey and pork, topped with twice the Canadian cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our Smoky Honey Mustard sauce for some added zest, eh? Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: #13 Suprimo
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to MEAT your match. The Suprimo is topped with salami, Deli-Style ham and pepperoni made from Canadian farm-raised pork, NEW capicola, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, banana peppers, our House Sandwich Sauce, and a doppio dose of processed cheddar cheese. Fantastico!  Includes sandwich, side, and drink of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: #6 Teriyaki Crunch
hasMenuItem.description: We added some crunch to this sweet & savoury favourite! The Teriyaki Crunch sandwich comes with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips, lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions, double the processed cheddar cheese, the satisfying crunch of our crispy onions and topped with our Sweet Onion Teriyaki sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #2 Great Canadian Club
hasMenuItem.description: Love the taste of Canada? Join the Club! Enjoy our Great Canadian Club, with Deli-Style turkey and ham, Maplewood Smoked bacon, made from Canadian farm-raised turkey and pork, topped with twice the Canadian cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our Smoky Honey Mustard sauce for some added zest, eh?

hasMenuItem.name: #18 Nashville-Style Hot Chicken
hasMenuItem.description:
Try the fiery Nashville-Style Hot Chicken sub! Delve into layers of flavor with rotisserie-style chicken, habanero jack cheese, fresh lettuce, juicy tomatoes, zesty pickles, and crispy onions.
Topped with peppercorn ranch and Nashville-style hot sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #30 Carnivore
hasMenuItem.description: The Carnivore takes our Cold Cut Trio and stacks it high with Italian-style pork capicola, zesty pepperoni, Genoa salami and double processed cheddar cheese. We top it off with fresh lettuce, crispy onions, pickles and drizzled with Southwest Chipotle sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #8 Steak'n Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: There's no mis-steak-ing your favourite club sandwich. Steak'n Bacon comes with Maplewood Smoked bacon and Canadian seasoned beef, topped with lettuce, tomatoes, spicy Chipotle sauce, our Peppercorn Ranch, and a double helping of Habanero Jack cheese for an added kick.

hasMenuItem.name: #5 Chicken Rancher
hasMenuItem.description: A fan favourite gets some added zing. The Chicken Rancher features Canadian farm-raised chicken and pork, made with rotisserie-style chicken and Maplewood Smoked Bacon, topped with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions, twice the shredded Monterrey Jack and cheddar, and the zesty kick of our Peppercorn Ranch dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: #21 Tandoori- Spiced Mozza
hasMenuItem.description: Say Hello to the Tandoori-Spiced Mozza. Delight in a fusion of flavors with tandoori-spiced mozzarella paired with zesty red onions, spinach, juicy tomatoes, flavourful green peppers, and crispy onions. All brought together with a drizzle of tandoori-spiced sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #9 Stampede Brisket
hasMenuItem.description: Ready for a brisket worthy of any rodeo? The Stampede Brisket starts with delicious beef brisket tossed in BBQ sauce, adds green peppers, red onions and a double helping of Canadian cheddar cheese, then finishes off with a crunch from our crispy onions and a drizzle of our Smoky Honey Mustard and Sweet & Smoky BBQ sauce. Yee-haw!

hasMenuItem.name: #16 Tandoori Twist
hasMenuItem.description:
Introducing our Tandoori Twist sub!
Sink your teeth into a tantalizing blend of flavors with our tandoori-spiced pork cutlet, layered with shredded Monterey cheddar cheese, spinach, juicy tomatoes, tangy banana peppers, and crispy onions.
Drizzled with our signature tandoori-spiced sauce, each bite is a burst of spices and savory goodness.

hasMenuItem.name: #19 Chimichurri Steak & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in our Chimichurri Steak & Cheese sub! Tender steak, melted processed cheddar, spinach, tomatoes, green peppers, red onions, and zesty chimichurri sauce. Savour every globally inspired bite!

hasMenuItem.name: #24 Chimichurri Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Revealing the Chimichurri Veggie! A flavour-packed delight for herbivores! Indulge in our savory veggie patty crowned with melted Canadian cheddar cheese. Fresh spinach, juicy tomatoes, crunchy green peppers, and zesty red onions with vibrant layers of garlic aioli and chimichurri sauce. Each bite is a burst of veggie goodness.

hasMenuItem.name: #13 Suprimo
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to MEAT your match. The Suprimo is topped with salami, Deli-Style ham and pepperoni made from Canadian farm-raised pork, capicola, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, banana peppers, our House Sandwich Sauce, and a doppio dose of processed cheddar cheese. Fantastico!

hasMenuItem.name: #23 Mozzarella Melt
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing the Mozzarella Melt, a cheese lover's dream! Delight in fresh mozzarella layered with vibrant spinach, succulent tomatoes, and zesty red onions. Summited with crispy onions for an irresistible crunch and kissed with our signature garlic aioli. Each bite is a harmonious fusion of flavors, crafted exclusively for cheese enthusiasts.

hasMenuItem.name: #17 Cuban Crunch
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing our irresistible Cuban Crunch sub! Dive into layers of flavor with succulent porchetta, deli-style ham, and habanero jack cheese, perfectly balanced with crisp lettuce, tangy pickles, and crunchy onions. Topped with Cuban-style sauce and smoky honey mustard, each bite brings Havana to your taste buds.

hasMenuItem.name: #20 Little Sicily
hasMenuItem.description: Say Ciao to the Little Sicily sub! Embark on a culinary journey with tiers of savory capicola, zesty pepperoni, and fresh mozzarella. Elevated with crisp lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, refreshing cucumbers, flavourful green peppers, and zesty red onions. Crowned with a delectable garlic aioli and our signature house sandwich sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #25 Shawarma Chicken (750 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing the delectable Shawarma Chicken Rice Bowl, a globally inspired masterpiece! Indulge in delicious wild rice blend, savoury shawarma-spiced rotisserie-style chicken, sprinkled with shredded Monterey cheese, crisp lettuce, spinach, juicy tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, zesty green peppers, tangy red onions, and crunchy pickles. Topped with crispy onions for that extra crunch and drizzled with Nashville-Style hot sauce and creamy Tahini. Experience globally inspired taste with every bite.

hasMenuItem.name: Jerk-Spiced Chicken (670 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Embark on a journey with our New Jerk-Spiced Chicken Rice Bowl. Featuring seasoned brown, red, and wild rice, jerk-spiced Rotisserie-Style chicken, crisp veggies, and a zesty Jerk Aioli drizzle.  Adventure awaits!

hasMenuItem.name: #1 Canuck Classic
hasMenuItem.description: Get a taste of Canada with a twist. Featuring our Maplewood Smoked bacon and Deli-Style ham, made with Canadian farm-raised pork, topped with lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, pickles and covered in twice as much Canadian Cheddar Cheese, then topped with our Smoky Honey Mustard and mayonnaise.

hasMenuItem.name: #3 Turkey Rancher
hasMenuItem.description: Saddle up and head for deliciousness. The Turkey Rancher features Canadian farm-raised turkey and Maplewood Smoked bacon, topped with twice the helping of Canadian cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, and the zesty kick of our Peppercorn Ranch dressing. Giddy up!

hasMenuItem.name: #15 Meatballer
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to hit the court with Meatballer. The same meatballs that you know and love now come with pepperoni and a cozy blanket of mozzarella and parmesan cheese. A slam dunk for your taste buds!

hasMenuItem.name: #25 Shawarma Chicken (850 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: That’s a Wrap with the new Shawarma Chicken Rice Wrap, a symphony of Globally Inspired flavours tucked into a tortilla wrap. Embrace a delicious wild rice blend, savoury shawarma-spiced rotisserie-style chicken, and an octet of shredded Monterey cheese, crisp lettuce, spinach, juicy tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, zesty green peppers, tangy red onions, and crunchy pickles. Finished off with crispy onions, Nashville-Style hot sauce and tahini for an explosion of flavour.

hasMenuItem.name: #22 The Big Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Unveiling the Big Veggie. A feast for plant-based palates! Sink your teeth into our hearty veggie patty topped with melted Canadian cheddar cheese. Crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, zesty red onions, and tangy pickles finished with a kick of chipotle southwest sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Jerk-Spiced Chicken (780 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Elevate your taste buds to new heights with our Jerk-Spiced Chicken Rice Wrap. Featuring seasoned brown, red, and wild rice, crisp veggies, jerk-spiced Rotisserie-Style chicken, and tantalizing Jerk Aioli all united in a flavour-packed adventure.

hasMenuItem.name: Steak & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Hot, tender, shaved steak, served on the bread of your choice. It's just bursting with flavour! Toast your bread to add even more great taste!

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Breast
hasMenuItem.description: Simple, yet always bursting with flavour. Dive into our deli-style turkey breast sandwich made with turkey raised on Canadian farms and topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant!

hasMenuItem.name: Meatball Marinara
hasMenuItem.description: Zesty meatballs covered with marinara sauce, and served on your choice of bread. Every bite is simply sensational! Get it toasted for even more great taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna
hasMenuItem.description: You’ll love every bite of our classic tuna sandwich. 100% wild caught tuna blended with creamy mayonnaise then topped with your choice of crisp, fresh veggies. 100% delicious.

hasMenuItem.name: Rotisserie-Style Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Try our juicy, Rotisserie-style Chicken, made with seasoned chicken and topped with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumber, green peppers, and red onions. Your tastebuds will thank you later!

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Delite®
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy, crunchy and classically delicious. The Veggie Delite® is proof that a veggie sandwich can be high in flavour. Try a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, cucumbers and onions. Customize it with your choice of condiments on the bread of your choice.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
hasMenuItem.description: Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki is stuffed with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips and fresh veggies, topped with our Sweet Onion Teriyaki sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Cold Cut Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love our Cold Cut Combo! One bite into these delicious deli meats, topped with crisp vegetables and served on your choice of bread and you'll be addicted.

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza Sub Melt
hasMenuItem.description: The Italian sandwich par excellence. Topped with marinara sauce, cheese and pepperoni. Try it toasted for even more pizza taste!

hasMenuItem.name: Italian B.M.T.®
hasMenuItem.description: There's a trip to Italy in every bite. This all-time Italian classic is packed with Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, and deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms. Get it topped with your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant on your choice of freshly baked bread, and you'll be saying "grazie!"

hasMenuItem.name: Black Forest Ham
hasMenuItem.description: A classic that never goes out of style. Made with pork raised on Canadian farms, our deli-style Black Forest ham has never been better. Load it up with all your favourite veggies freshly sliced in restaurant, on your choice of freshly baked bread. Yum!

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Patty
hasMenuItem.description: Our veggie patty is vegan and free of artificial colours and flavours. Topped with lettuce, spinach, onions, peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers and your favourite sauce!

hasMenuItem.name: Holiday Sub
hasMenuItem.description: Try our classic Turkey Breast sandwich with your favourite veggies, processed cheddar cheese and our NEW Cranberry Dijon.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki (490 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet and savoury, all in a convenient bowl! Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki Signature Rice Bowl is stuffed with teriyaki glazed chicken strips, a selection of fresh veggies and a blend of seasoned brown, red & wild rice, and topped with Sweet Onion sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: #25 Shawarma Chicken (750 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Introducing the delectable Shawarma Chicken Rice Bowl, a globally inspired masterpiece! Indulge in delicious wild rice blend, savoury shawarma-spiced rotisserie-style chicken, sprinkled with shredded Monterey cheese, crisp lettuce, spinach, juicy tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, zesty green peppers, tangy red onions, and crunchy pickles. Topped with crispy onions for that extra crunch and drizzled with Nashville-Style hot sauce and creamy Tahini. Experience globally inspired taste with every bite.

hasMenuItem.name: Southwest Steak & Avocado (610 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Get a taste of Tex-Mex all in a convenient bowl. Our Southwest Steak & Avocado Signature Rice Bowl is made with Canadian seasoned steak, Smashed Avocado, a selection of fresh veggies, a blend of seasoned brown, red & wild rice, topped with an extra kick with the classic Southwest Chipotle sauce and sweet and tangy Banana Peppers.

hasMenuItem.name: Jerk-Spiced Chicken (670 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Embark on a journey with our New Jerk-Spiced Chicken Rice Bowl. Featuring seasoned brown, red, and wild rice, jerk-spiced Rotisserie-Style chicken, crisp veggies, and a zesty Jerk Aioli drizzle.  Adventure awaits!

hasMenuItem.name: Egg & Ham
hasMenuItem.description: You’ll love every bite of our Egg & Ham sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, deli-style Black Forest ham made with pork raised on Canadian farms, and processed white cheddar. Simply delicious.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese & Egg (400 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Made with Canadian eggs, processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomatoes and drizzled with mayo, all sandwiched between ciabatta bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Once you try our Egg & Cheese sandwich, you’ll never look back. Made with Canadian eggs, and processed white cheddar. So good.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg & Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Our Egg & Bacon sandwich will leave you wanting seconds. Made with Canadian eggs, tasty Maplewood smoked bacon made from pork raised on Canadian farms  and processed white cheddar.

hasMenuItem.name: Sausage & Egg (550 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Made with Canadian eggs, a pork sausage patty, processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomatoes and drizzled with mayo, all sandwiched between ciabatta bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon & Egg (450 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Made with Canadian eggs, maplewood smoked bacon, processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomatoes and drizzled with mayo, all sandwiched between ciabatta bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Sausage & Cheese (470 Cals)

hasMenuItem.description: Made with Canadian eggs, deli-style ham, processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomatoes and drizzled with mayo, all sandwiched between ciabatta bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Sausage & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Made with a pork sausage patty, processed cheddar cheese, spinach, tomatoes and drizzled with mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg & Sausage
hasMenuItem.description: Power through any day with our Egg & Sausage sandwich. Made with Canadian eggs, sausage, and processed white cheddar cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: #25 Shawarma Chicken (850 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: That’s a Wrap with the new Shawarma Chicken Rice Wrap, a symphony of Globally Inspired flavours tucked into a tortilla wrap. Embrace a delicious wild rice blend, savoury shawarma-spiced rotisserie-style chicken, and an octet of shredded Monterey cheese, crisp lettuce, spinach, juicy tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, zesty green peppers, tangy red onions, and crunchy pickles. Finished off with crispy onions, Nashville-Style hot sauce and tahini for an explosion of flavour.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki (690 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet and savoury, for those on the go! Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki Signature Rice Wrap is stuffed with teriyaki glazed chicken strips, a selection of fresh veggies and a blend of seasoned brown, red & wild rice, and topped with Sweet Onion sauce. Grilled Wrap option available at participating restaurants.

hasMenuItem.name: Jerk-Spiced Chicken (780 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Elevate your taste buds to new heights with our Jerk-Spiced Chicken Rice Wrap. Featuring seasoned brown, red, and wild rice, crisp veggies, jerk-spiced Rotisserie-Style chicken, and tantalizing Jerk Aioli all united in a flavour-packed adventure.

hasMenuItem.name: Southwest Steak & Avocado (810 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Get a taste of Tex-Mex for those on the go. Our Southwest Steak & Avocado Signature Rice Wrap is made with Canadian seasoned steak, Smashed Avocado, a selection of fresh veggies, a blend of seasoned brown, red & wild rice, topped with an extra kick with the classic Southwest Chipotle sauce and sweet and tangy Banana Peppers. Grilled Wrap option available at participating restaurants.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki (240 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

hasMenuItem.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

hasMenuItem.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

hasMenuItem.name: Tropicana® Orange Juice (170 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: What makes up our deliciously nourishing orange juice- made with fresh-picked oranges. never any sugar or water added. taste a little sunshine each morning with 100% pure orange juice.

hasMenuItem.name: Diet Pepsi® (0 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side and drink. our sides run from salty to sweet and from fit to indulgent. with such a variety of drinks to choose from, there's truly something for every taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Pepsi® (260 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: L’excellent cola au goût audacieux et rafraîchissant. il est parfait pour les partys, les repas et toute autre célébration. 591 ml /20 oz - le format parfait de boisson à consommer sur le pouce.

hasMenuItem.name: Brisk® Lemon Iced Tea (150 Cals)
hasMenuItem.description: This is the brisk® that started it all. the original iced tea with tons of attitude. the one with the bold lemon flavour that kicked iced tea off the back porch. now that’s brisk, baby

hasMenuItem.name: Pure Leaf Peach Iced Tea (100 Cals)

review.reviewBody: Missing avocado I paid for in one of my sandwiches . Other sandwich was way too salty . This is my standing order fromsubway  usually and this particular location failed big time .
They did NOT pay attention to the quantities and I didn’t receive my entire order.
Not the chips I ordered so someone should atleast call me for other options than getting me chips that I won't eat
